attributes.additional_details: There is a general consensus amongst the majority of voters that Brexit has been a failure and that voters were misled about the benefits. Now is the time to begin negotiating our re-entry back into the Europe. This should help in our economic recovery and general wealth of the country.
attributes.background: I want parliament to have a full, open, and honest debate about beginning negotiations for the re-entry of Great Britain and Northern Ireland back into the European Union. All of the potential benefits should be discussed and debated with the implications for the future of the country

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure if you want the Government to seek re-entry to the EU, or to investigate the costs and benefits of rejoining the EU.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Run a multiple choice referendum on the UK's relationship with the EU #Brexit: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636499
